rukus.text: Day ur twalav ara wid iumnen, zi$emma, s wayen ik ed irsen, d wayen id irsen, uqbel ik? B$an aeuddu ioebbiten n tkerkas, ulamma pwamoen a ten nekoen. Ib$a Cciian a ten itlef ttelfan u$miq
Ma nnan asen: "aset ed ar wayen id Issers Oebbi, akw ar Umazan", a pwaliv ixabiten wexxoen ak, ugin
Amek ihi, ma u$en tiyta, ilmend n wayen xedmen ifassen nnsen, sinna, a d asen $uoek, ad ggalen s Oebbi: "neb$a kan lewqama akked lembwafqa
Widak, Ieoa Oebbi i illan deg ulawen nnsen. Ihi, iiixeo asen, nabi iten, meslay iten, $ef iman nnsen, s wawal iqenaen
Ur d Nuzen Amazan, siwa kan iwakken ad as a$en awal, ma Irad Oebbi. Wid idensen iman nnsen, ma usan k id, d$a ssutren ssmae i Oebbi, u issuter Umazan ad ppusemmeen, ad afen Oebbi Issuruf, Ipeunu
Xaii! S Mass ik, ur ppamnen, alamma rran k d ameaddi, deg wayen i$ef mgarraden. Sinna, ur ppafen, deg iman nnsen, ara ten ihewwlen, deg wayen id teuddev. Ad anzen yal annuz
Lemmer i sen Nuri: "mmin$et"! Ne$ "ff$et seg ixxamen nnwen"! Ur p xeddmen, siwa kra segsen. Ppif, i nitni, lemmer xdimen ayen u$uo pwanecden. D atebbet uuwib
Imiren ad asen Nefk, s$uoneÂ£, arraz ameqwoaean
A ten Nenhu s abrid uwqim
Wid ippa$en awal i Oebbi akked Umazan, widak atnan ar wid I$at Oebbi ger lambiyya, wid issdaqen, ccuhada, uualein. Ay telha tdukli d wigi
Wagi d lfevl s$uo Oebbi. Nesteqnaa s Oebbi d Amusnaw
